whatWeDo.sectionDesc: Develop and programmatically automate security in planning, development, assessment, and operational activities

items.name: During PLANNING an organization can use MITRE | SAF to:
bullets: Identify applicable security and privacy requirements
Identify MITRE | SAF tools to support development, assessment, & operations security processes
Become a participant through the Continuous Collaboration Agreement

items.name: During DEVELOPMENT an organization can use MITRE | SAF to:
bullets: Validate security status and aggregate security testing data at each build
Drill-down in visualization tools to identify security defect root cause and mitigations

items.name: During ASSESSMENT an organization can use MITRE | SAF to:
bullets: Aggregate all security control assessment data
Visualize security status to prioritize assessment activities
Run validation checks on prioritized areas
Drill-down in visualization tools to identify root cause and inform risk assessment

items.name: During OPERATIONS an organization can use MITRE | SAF to:
bullets: Monitor security posture through validation checks
Aggregate normalized security testing content to enable data visualization, drill-down, and root cause analysis
Assign remediation actions for identified security risks

whatWeDo.sectionDesc: Develop a toolchain to support the above areas of What and How for secure development
